author: intrepid42
body:
#### PR description:

Backporting new HCAL MC reco pulse shape to 11_1, see https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/31014.
It is deactivated by default and can be activated by HcalRecoParams conditions.

#### PR validation:

Workflow 11634.0 runs with default and new pulse shape.
title: HCAL MC: adding pulse shape 208 for signal reconstruction (11_1_X)
